content.content: Key Info Name: Deimos Nickname: then endgame plan delegate Forum: @Deimos Delegate Address: 0x94070ad138abdd3742166e75b4d4e645b5d8b11e  Core Values  Power to Holder MKR holders are not heard rn this needs to change  Accountability research current CUs to ensure good accountability what they work on what they are doing is it aligned with endgame plan  Action!  Implement ENDGAME PLAN!  ENSURE good transitiong  Delegate Statement Deimos: history with Maker protocol (both good and room for improvement). Know the ecosystem, and have vision for future of a Powerful DAO. MakerDAO faces many challenges today. Improve:  Core Unit accountability DDirection & DCoordination Fix reward and incentives  As your Delegate, I will fight (not rly @prose) to make ecosystem better and act as steward for MKR holders interests. My post history tells story of what Delegate I act for you. Motivation for Delegate is from focus on Governance by Rune & DAO Singularity. I support the evolution of MakerDAO described in Rune’s presentations and documents. Singularity enables a future state of Maker that aligns with my values. I wil work for MKR holdrs to achieve greater accountability at every level.  Communication Forum is my communication platform.  Post for Platform & Vote Post for open discussions with anyone DMs   Professional Knowledge  MKR hodler since 2017 8 year Entrepreneurship 12 year organisational change 3 year Operations Director   Conflict of Interest Yes, will make conflicts interesting  Waiver of Liability By delegating to Deimos, you acknowledge and agree that Deimos will participate on a best efforts basis and will not be liable for any form of damages related to participation in the Maker Protocol or MakerDAO.  Delegate code of Conduct I have read and agree to the Delegate Code of Conduct.
content.GPT-summary: The post is an explanation of the Deimos Delegation Platform proposal, which aims to improve the MakerDAO ecosystem by ensuring greater accountability and alignment with the endgame plan. The author provides their background and motivation for the proposal, as well as their communication platform and conflict of interest statement. The post also invites feedback and questions from third parties and advertises the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal

content.content: Deimos:  Delegate code of Conduct   So you agree to good faith and respect part?
We needed a delegate like this, who has no problem saying the things that need to be said. I expect a good management, I will delegate a couple of MKR as soon as I can.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving entirely positive feedback on proposal
